history.proof: intros a b p q H. induction H. - shelve. - auto.

ctx: intros a b p q H.
intros a b p q H.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
eqTerm_imp_eqT: forall a b : Term A n, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b

Goal:
forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a b

Premises:
eqTerm : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
pX : forall (A : Type) (n : nat), Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n)

Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope

Inductive eqP : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop := eqP0 : eqP (pO A n) (pO A n) | eqpP1 : forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP p q -> eqP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q) Arguments eqP (_ _)%list_scope Arguments eqpP1 _ _ (_ _)%list_scope

multTerm_plusTerm_dist_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b c : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a c) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b c)) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) c)
olist_pX_eqT : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a b : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> olist (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p)
plusTerm_assoc : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a a0 A2 : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) A2 a0 -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a a0 -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) A2 a0) a) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) A2 (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a0 a))

invTerm_invol : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (invTerm invA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) a))
mult_invTerm_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) a) b) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b))
eqpP1 : forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP p q -> eqP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q)
Inductive eqP : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop := eqP0 : eqP (pO A n) (pO A n) | eqpP1 : forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP p q -> eqP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q) Arguments eqP (_ _)%list_scope Arguments eqpP1 _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
eqP_sind : forall P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> SProp, P (pO A n) (pO A n) -> (forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP p q -> P p q -> P (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q)) -> forall l l0 : list (Term A n), eqP l l0 -> P l l0
eqP_ind : forall P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop, P (pO A n) (pO A n) -> (forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP p q -> P p q -> P (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q)) -> forall l l0 : list (Term A n), eqP l l0 -> P l l0

```coq
intros a b p q H.
induction H.
- intros. inversion H.
- intros. inversion H. subst. apply eqpP1.
  + assumption.
  + apply IHclos_refl_trans1. reflexivity.
Qed. 
```

original: intros a b p q H. induction H. - intros. inversion H. - intros. inversion H. subst. apply eqpP1. + auto. + apply IHclos_refl_trans1. reflexivity.
